ingredients: 1 cup vanilla yogurt, 1  banana, broken into chunks,   +   1/2 cup frozen mango chunks, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, or to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 6mg 2%, Sodium 157mg 7%, Total Carbohydrate 41g 15%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 32g, Protein 11g, Vitamin C 18mg 88%, Calcium 224mg 17%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 649mg 14%
